Amitabh: Entry hui, sab bol pade — waah kya baat!
Aamir: Dimag ka game, sab pe bhaari
Jab scene aaye, ho jaye shor

Ajay: Aankhon me fire, silence se vaar

Entry me lagti hai gunshot wali feel

Jab aaye, toh na ho koi lag
Bas screen pe aaye — kare bless
Bobby: Silent killer with full power lobby
Swag leke aaye, full filmy hobby
Scene me aaye, sab bolen wow Bobby
Boman: Comedy timing ho sharp like sword
Dialogue delivery kare sab ko floored
Scene me aaye toh full attention
Sab kahen — Boman tera no match

Jab aaye screen pe kare impact
